item.title: Cyberpunk 2077: Gangs of Night City Board Game is Over $40 Off for October Prime Day
item.content:encoded:
Good morning, Night City!

Day two of Prime Big Deal Days still has some excellent savings up its sleeve. If you've been on the hunt for some board game deals, you're in luck, as there have been quite a few popping up during the sale event. For those looking to take a little trip back to Night City, the Cyberpunk 2077: Gangs of Night City board game is currently on sale for Prime members.

At the moment, Cyberpunk 2077: Gangs of Night City is down to $80.49, a $44.50 discount from its list price of $124.99. If you've been itching to get your hands on it, now's the time to move as it may not stay at this price for long beyond Prime Big Deal Days.

Prime Big Deal Days: Cyberpunk 2077: Gangs of Night City Board Game for $80.49

Cyberpunk 2077: Gangs of Night City

Gangs of Night City can be played with 1-4 players, where you'll each take on the role of a leader of a gang. As you play, you'll each work to recruit new members, claim new territory, and battle each other to see who comes out on top. We called it a "surprisingly preem experience" in our review. Writer Charlie Theel continued to say it's a, "solid game of gang-on-gang warfare that is as concerned with efficiently managing actions and resources as it is in dishing out bloodshed."

If you're in the mood to pick up even more board games during the October Prime Day sale, have a look at our breakdown of 25 board game deals that are still live in Amazonâ€™s October Prime Day sale. Alongside Gangs of Night City, you can also save on Heat: Pedal to the Metal right now, Azul, The Lord of The Rings: Duel for Middle-Earth, and more.

More Board Game Deals

Outside of board games, Amazon has so much more to look through right now before Prime Big Deal Days comes to an end. We've gathered up some of the best deals available in the sale right now, so you can grab the ones that catch your eye before they're gone.
